channel.title: Nathan Tatum
channel.description: i dig data and the outdoors

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Welcome to my personal site/blog! I’m planning to utilize this to post a mix of personal stuff, work stuff, and side projects. I haven’t had a personal site since my college days when I was trying to learn more about HTML/CSS. My main motivations are really just to document what I’m working on and hopefully encourage me to write more. I’m not really a front-end guy, so I’m clearly leveraging someone else’s design - specifically Josh Gerdes. Stay tuned.
